description:
Climate disinformation was routinely broadcast in news programmes across French TV and radio in the first three months of 2025, with 128 verified cases identified by an alliance of NGOs. Using AI to identify misleading narratives, which were then reviewed by fact-checkers, the alliance assessed programmes classed as “news” by the French broadcast regulator ARCOM […]

The post Climate Disinformation ‘Normalised’ on French TV and Radio, Report Finds appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Climate Disinformation ‘Normalised’ on French TV and Radio, Report Finds
